thread.title: Catelynn Lowell’s Husband Tyler Admits Cheating Bombshell: ‘I Couldn’t Resist!’
thread.title_full: Catelynn Lowell’s Husband Tyler Admits Cheating Bombshell: ‘I Couldn’t Resist!’

author: Teresa Roca
title: Catelynn Lowell’s Husband Tyler Admits Cheating Bombshell: ‘I Couldn’t Resist!’
text:
Catelynn Lowell’s Husband Tyler Admits Cheating Bombshell: ‘I Couldn’t Resist!’ Baltierra claims he was 'drunk.'   10:37AM 
Another day, another Teen Mom cheating scandal! Catelynn Lowell and Tyler Baltierra are the latest stars to be hit with infidelity rumors – and they’re telling all about the alleged tryst! 
“The MTV cameras have turned a blind eye to the cheating by this significant other of an OG Teen Mom because it doesn’t fit in the storyline for this season for the couple,” a blind item on the site Crazy Days and Nights revealed . “Tyler/Catelynn.” 
Lowell responded to the rumor, “Well since it’s out in the open @TylerBaltierra did cheat on me. He’s busted.” 
PHOTOS: Who Cried, Who Wasn’t Invited: 10 Behind-The-Scenes Secrets Of ‘Teen Mom OG’ Stars Catelynn Lowell and Tyler Baltierra’s Big Wedding! 
But the Teen Mom OG star was just joking, as her husband added, “Damn it! We really tried keeping that a secret too! Well I’m sorry, I couldn’t resist her/him… idk it was dark and I was drunk .” 
The mother of Novalee , 2, posted a selfie with the caption, “ Much love and a big #F**koff to the haters , but sooo much love for my lovers.” 
As Radar readers know, the couple has experienced marital issues on the most recent season of TMOG . 
Although Lowell entered rehab to battle her depression and anxiety, her husband slammed her when she returned to her old habits. 
“You know what Cate? You better figure something out soon,” he said. “Listen, if you go into this thing again I got to check out. I’ll get hardened. I’ll close everyone off. It’s safe that way.” 
Lowell then cried, “I feel like my mental illness ruins everything!” 
But it seems the longtime loves have worked through their issues, as Baltierra tweeted, “I love you!” 
Do you think Baltierra cheated? Tell us in the comments!
